pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a static shot from inside a room, looking out a window at a city skyline. The sky is dark and filled with strange, swirling, luminous pink and purple clouds or energy formations. A silhouetted plant is visible in the foreground on the right.
